data.text: @jaimemomo To protect your privacy, we recommend you to remove your details from public and send us DM via below link. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@jaimemomo Sorry to hear this. Can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@VPushkar @united Baggage team is already aware of your case. They will keep you posted. -Vinci
@eddyshreddy Sorry to hear this, Edgar. You may share your feedback with us online via https://t.co/s5reyVMJLe -Vinci
@rhexryan We have sent you a DM and you can either reply there or click below link to send DM. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@devarshiajoshi Can you please let us know your inquiry in DM? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@rhexryan We’re sorry to learn about your disappointment. Can you please let us know your eTicket no and full name in DM so we can pass to our customer relation team? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@edwong97 Sorry to hear this, we will help to feed this back to the team. Thank you for your patience -Vinci

@whitetiger785 We have already advised you to send to the right team to follow-up on the issue, however, according to the DM that you sent us, you are not sending to the one we have suggested, we have advised you to send to the right team again, and please allow us to follow-up with you in DM.

@nirvyk Beautiful shot! Thanks for sharing with us :)
Happy New Year! -Vinci
